ivardefs.name: accident
ivardefs.desc: Details of a accident which resulted in injuries which required the products and services listed in the claim.

ivardefs.name: addItem_
ivardefs.desc: The first-tier service adjudications for payor added product or service lines.

ivardefs.name: benefitBalance_
ivardefs.desc: Balance by Benefit Category.

ivardefs.name: benefitPeriod
ivardefs.desc: The term of the benefits documented in this response.

ivardefs.name: billablePeriod
ivardefs.desc: The period for which charges are being submitted.

ivardefs.name: careTeam_
ivardefs.desc: The members of the team who provided the products and services.

ivardefs.name: claim
ivardefs.desc: The business identifier for the instance of the adjudication request: claim predetermination or preauthorization.

ivardefs.name: claimResponse
ivardefs.desc: The business identifier for the instance of the adjudication response: claim, predetermination or preauthorization response.

ivardefs.name: created
ivardefs.desc: The date this resource was created.

ivardefs.name: diagnosis_
ivardefs.desc: Information about diagnoses relevant to the claim items.

ivardefs.name: disposition
ivardefs.desc: A human readable description of the status of the adjudication.

ivardefs.name: enterer
ivardefs.desc: Individual who created the claim, predetermination or preauthorization.

ivardefs.name: facility
ivardefs.desc: Facility where the services were provided.

ivardefs.name: form
ivardefs.desc: The actual form, by reference or inclusion, for printing the content or an EOB.

ivardefs.name: formCode
ivardefs.desc: A code for the form to be used for printing the content.

ivardefs.name: fundsReserve
ivardefs.desc: A code, used only on a response to a preauthorization, to indicate whether the benefits payable have been reserved and for whom.

ivardefs.name: fundsReserveRequested
ivardefs.desc: A code to indicate whether and for whom funds are to be reserved for future claims.

ivardefs.name: identifier_
ivardefs.desc: A unique identifier assigned to this explanation of benefit.

ivardefs.name: insurance_
ivardefs.desc: Financial instruments for reimbursement for the health care products and services specified on the claim.

ivardefs.name: insurer
ivardefs.desc: The party responsible for authorization, adjudication and reimbursement.

ivardefs.name: item_
ivardefs.desc: A claim line. Either a simple (a product or service) or a 'group' of details which can also be a simple items or groups of sub-details.

ivardefs.name: originalPrescription
ivardefs.desc: Original prescription which has been superseded by this prescription to support the dispensing of pharmacy services, medications or products.

ivardefs.name: outcome
ivardefs.desc: The outcome of the claim, predetermination, or preauthorization processing.

ivardefs.name: patient
ivardefs.desc: The party to whom the professional services and/or products have been supplied or are being considered and for whom actual for forecast reimbursement is sought.

ivardefs.name: payee
ivardefs.desc: The party to be reimbursed for cost of the products and services according to the terms of the policy.

ivardefs.name: payment
ivardefs.desc: Payment details for the adjudication of the claim.

ivardefs.name: preAuthRefPeriod_
ivardefs.desc: The timeframe during which the supplied preauthorization reference may be quoted on claims to obtain the adjudication as provided.

ivardefs.name: preAuthRef_
ivardefs.desc: Reference from the Insurer which is used in later communications which refers to this adjudication.

ivardefs.name: precedence
ivardefs.desc: This indicates the relative order of a series of EOBs related to different coverages for the same suite of services.

ivardefs.name: prescription
ivardefs.desc: Prescription to support the dispensing of pharmacy, device or vision products.

ivardefs.name: priority
ivardefs.desc: The provider-required urgency of processing the request. Typical values include: stat, routine deferred.

ivardefs.name: procedure_
ivardefs.desc: Procedures performed on the patient relevant to the billing items with the claim.

ivardefs.name: processNote_
ivardefs.desc: A note that describes or explains adjudication results in a human readable form.

ivardefs.name: provider
ivardefs.desc: The provider which is responsible for the claim, predetermination or preauthorization.

ivardefs.name: referral
ivardefs.desc: A reference to a referral resource.

ivardefs.name: related_
ivardefs.desc: Other claims which are related to this claim such as prior submissions or claims for related services or for the same event.

ivardefs.name: status
ivardefs.desc: The status of the resource instance.

ivardefs.name: subType
ivardefs.desc: A finer grained suite of claim type codes which may convey additional information such as Inpatient vs Outpatient and/or a specialty service.

ivardefs.name: supportingInfo_
ivardefs.desc: Additional information codes regarding exceptions, special considerations, the condition, situation, prior or concurrent issues.

ivardefs.name: total_
ivardefs.desc: Categorized monetary totals for the adjudication.

ivardefs.name: type
ivardefs.desc: The category of claim, e.g. oral, pharmacy, vision, institutional, professional.

ivardefs.name: use
ivardefs.desc: A code to indicate whether the nature of the request is: to request adjudication of products and services previously rendered; or requesting authorization and adjudication for provision in the future; or requesting the non-binding adjudication of the list

properties.desc: This resource provides: the claim details; adjudication details from the processing of a Claim; and optionally account balance information, for informing the subscriber of the benefits provided.
